name: ai-testcase-analyzer
description: Playwright + TypeScript test automation framework with AI failure analysis and Slack notifications.

scripts.demo:headed: ts-node src/run-all.ts --demo --headed && ts-node src/failure-clustering.ts --advanced --demo && ts-node src/report-generator.ts --ai-analysis --demo
scripts.prod: ts-node src/run-all.ts && ts-node src/failure-clustering.ts --advanced && ts-node src/report-generator.ts --ai-analysis
scripts.ci: npm run prod && npm run notify
